title: Remake bugged and demoted me - I was marked as leaver even though I was the one who remade
body:
So I just got demoted from S1 to S2, as I initiated a remake when all 5 players were actually in-game. I was marked as the leaver despite having no leaver in the game.

I wasn't even at 0lp, so I'm not sure why I took a loss AND was demoted? Explain.

replies.body:
Then I'm unsure as to why is should be available to the person who was marked afk, as I was the one who initiated it so clearly I couldn't have been AFK?

As for MMR, I believe the system is quite broken as I do only gain about 5lp per match and lose 20lp+ and at the time my Win/Lose was at approx 297W 270L and am being matched with Low silver/high bronze players.

Is this your Annie game? You must have hit inactivity limit and it marked you as the leaver. According to your match history in that game you were still level 1 when it ended, as well as having done no damage. For the remake option to actually become possible, someone in your game would have had to been marked as AFK during the first 3 minutes. All indications point to it being you (even if you became active/reconnected as or just after the /remake became available). 

I am unsure about the demotion aspect to it, although it usually means your MMR was not up to a silver 1 standard (in fact, it would have to be quite below if you still had some LP before 0 when you demoted).
